bridge-type.label: MAX!Cube LAN gateway
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the MAX!Cube LAN gateway.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: MAX!Cube LAN gateway IP
parameter.description: The IP address of the MAX!Cube LAN gateway. If none provided, binding will try to discover it.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: MAX!Cube LAN gateway port
parameter.description: Port of the LAN gateway. If empty, default port 62910 will be used.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in ms which is used to poll given MAX!Cube.

parameter.name: serial
parameter.label: Serial Number
parameter.description: The Serial Number identifier identifies one specific device.
